storey.notFoundMessage: Storey with ID {{id}} could not be found.
storey.noPerimeters: No perimeters have been added to this storey yet.

roof.mixedValuesTooltip: Different values across sides. Changing this will update all sides.
roof.mixedWarning: Select individual overhang sides to edit them separately

wallPost.notFoundMessage: Post with ID {{id}} could not be found.
wallPost.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to remove this post?
wallPost.moveInstructions: To move the post, you can use the Move Tool {{moveKey}} or click any of the distance measurements shown in the editor to adjust them.

perimeterCorner.notFoundMessage: Corner with ID {{id}} could not be found.
perimeterCorner.nonRightAngleDescription: Corners with angles that are not multiples of 90° are not fully supported yet. Construction details for this corner may require manual review and adjustments.
perimeterCorner.cornerLockedDescription: Cannot switch which wall constructs this corner because the current constructing wall has posts extending into the corner area. Remove those posts first to unlock corner switching.
perimeterCorner.cannotSwitchTooltip: Cannot switch - wall has posts in corner area
perimeterCorner.cannotDeleteMinCorners: Cannot delete - perimeter needs at least 3 corners
perimeterCorner.cannotDeleteSelfIntersect: Cannot delete - would create self-intersecting polygon
perimeterCorner.mixedAssembliesDescription: Adjacent walls use different assembly types. Special attention may be needed at this corner.
perimeterCorner.thicknessDifferenceDescription: Adjacent walls have different thicknesses ({{difference}}mm difference).

perimeter.notFoundMessage: Perimeter with ID {{id}} could not be found.
perimeter.nonRightAnglesDescription: This perimeter contains corners with angles that are not multiples of 90°. Construction planning for such corners is not fully supported yet.
perimeter.mixedValuesTooltip: Different values across walls. Changing this will update all walls.

perimeterWall.notFoundMessage: Wall with ID {{id}} could not be found.
perimeterWall.cannotDeleteMinWalls: Cannot delete - perimeter needs at least 3 walls
perimeterWall.cannotDeleteSelfIntersect: Cannot delete - would create self-intersecting polygon

opening.notFoundMessage: Opening with ID {{id}} could not be found.
opening.typeTooltip: Opening types don't influence the construction yet but are rendered differently.
opening.openingAssemblyTooltip: Override the opening assembly for this specific opening. Leave as default to inherit from the wall assembly or global default.
opening.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to remove this opening?
opening.moveInstructions: To move the opening, you can use the Move Tool {{moveKey}} or click any of the distance measurements shown in the editor to adjust them.
